name: Tokimeki Memorial: Taisen Puzzledama
overview: This is the first game with characters and based on the first Tokimeki game ,after release this puzzle game on the arcades Konami released this game on Saturn, Playstation and PC. The game has 9 levels , and you can continue in all except in level 9 In this battle against Shiori (or Miharu, if you're playing as Shiori), you aren't allowed to continue. So if you lose, instead of the "Continue?" prompt, you'll get your character's "bad" ending. There are 14 characters to choose from but only 11 are playable from the start Yoshio, Rei, and Miharu has to be unlocked.
